posts.post_content:
Recently started to go through the card collection and have come across some fantastic cards. I have the following Old Judge cards for sale:

Graded:
O'Rourke, Jersey City, PSA 3 - (SOLD)
Keefe, New York, PSA 3 - (SOLD

Currently Ungraded
Faatz, Cleveland - $275
Hoover, Philadelphia - (SOLD)
Vinton, Minneapolis - $200
West, Minneapolis - $225
Cooney, Omaha - $275
Duryea, Cincinnati - $200
Tuckerman, St. Paul - $175
Sutcliffe, Cleveland - $275
Flood, St Joseph's - (SOLD)
Burch, St Louis - $200
Devlin, St Louis - $225
Holbert, Brooklyn - $225
Seery, Indianapolis - $175
E. Smith, Cincinnati - $200
Emmerke, Des Moines - $200
Powell, Sioux City - $225
Caruthers, Brooklyn -  (SOLD)
Collins, Brooklyn - $225
Pickett, Kansas City - $175

I can provide scans of individual cards & poses in short order for those interested. All cards have "CW Church" stamped on the back. 

Paypal Gift option is preferred payment method, though will consider others.

You can email [url]ryanexpressdaily@gmail.com[/url] or send PM.
Are you selling cards on ebay, in auctions, while trying to sell them here too?

Hi Leon,

The Keefe is the only one currently up on Ebay (the O'Rourke was, but has been taken down). That auction is going to run its course so that would be the only way to get that particular card.

The others aren't listed or offered anywhere else at the moment and are only posted currently to this forum.

[quote name="Cards&More" post=1336666]Hi Leon,

The Keefe is the only one currently up on Ebay (the O'Rourke was, but has been taken down). That auction is going to run its course so that would be the only way to get that particular card.

The others aren't listed or offered anywhere else at the moment and are only posted currently to this forum.[/QUOTE]

Isn't the Keefe in your list for sale here on the board, above? I don't think it would be be good form to sell something here while actively having an auction on ebay. That is what it seems like to me but maybe I am missing something?

My apologies if my listing doesn't follow the proper protocol. New to the board and definitely didn't want to ruffle any feathers.

The Keefe card is up on Ebay already and it is going to stay there with the auction playing out as it will. I had included it originally in my list just to alert folks that I have one for sale in case they were interested in it and wanted to bid. 

I can remove it from my original post to remove any confusion if that is of concern!

[quote name="Cards&More" post=1336707]My apologies if my listing doesn't follow the proper protocol. New to the board and definitely didn't want to ruffle any feathers.

The Keefe card is up on Ebay already and it is going to stay there with the auction playing out as it will. I had included it originally in my list just to alert folks that I have one for sale in case they were interested in it and wanted to bid. 

I can remove it from my original post to remove any confusion if that is of concern![/QUOTE]

Just take it off of sale on this board. Not a big deal. If you want to promote ebay listings, no worries, there is a BST section for that. No one should be selling something on this board while auctioning it somewhere else. To me it isn't a good situation. Thanks for your understanding....LL

Updated original post with remaining cards and pricing information. 

Sent messages back to some of you whom had originally inquired regarding the updated pricing.
I also have some great N300's that I will post as soon as I can.
